allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add dynamic header search and fix React key warning

- Add expandable search bar to desktop header navigation
- Add inline search form to mobile menu
- Search works from any page, navigates to /churches/search
- Fix React key prop warning in search results by using Fragment

Also includes: SEO improvements, OG images, sitemap restructuring,
hero images, FAQ section, and content quality checks.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
